name: 3D Runner
description: Runner game. Exiting levels, fight and jump with angry animals like crocodile tigers. Indian village and jungles. Proper detailed descriptive graphics of Indian villages in 18th century. The game has three game modes namely endless and time-trials set in various environments like Indian villages durga puja times, ancient ruins, night jungles and beach, village and caverns. Every environment has its own set of obstacles such as boulders, deer, tigers, monkeys. How far can you run.
